thread.section_title: Everleap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everleap | everleap.com
thread.title: Bret Nealis

author: Bret Nealis
title: Bret Nealis
text:
Everleap sets the standard for hosting services! NO ONE does it better--and easier! The process of setting up a site with database hosting (SQL Server or MySQL) simply cannot be done more easily. Everything from start to finish is simple and the information that you need is made obvious in each step of the process--from setting up a SQL database and related connectivity, to establishing user e-mail accounts, to setting up (or transferring) a hosting site, to integrating site development with Visual Studio, it's all painless and quick!
The site is amazingly responsive, too!
The price is ridiculously affordable, too, for all the services provided!
Support is awesome (though you probably won't need it)!
Go with Everleap! You won't regret it!
